s1.title: 1. Who we are
s1.body: "Holiday Villas" provides accommodation in Orllan, Lake Batllava. We respect your privacy and process personal data in accordance with GDPR and local laws.

s2.title: 2. What data we collect
s2.li1: Identification and contact details (first/last name, email, phone).
s2.li2: Booking data (dates, number of guests, service preferences).
s2.li3: Payment data (processed by payment processor; we do not store cards).
s2.li4: Technical data (cookies, IP, browser) for statistics and security.

s3.title: 3. How we use it
s3.li1: To manage your booking and stay.
s3.li2: For communications about confirmation, invoicing, and support.
s3.li3: For security, abuse prevention, and service improvement.
s3.li4: With your consent: offers and marketing updates (you can unsubscribe anytime).

s5.title: 5. Sharing with third parties
s5.body: Sharing occurs only when necessary: payment processor, IT/hosting providers, and booking platforms (e.g., Booking.com) when you book via them. These parties process data under valid processing agreements.

s6.title: 6. Cookies
s6.body: We use essential cookies for site functionality (e.g., session) and analytics/performance with your consent. You can manage cookies via the consent banner or your browser settings.
s6.li2: Analytics: visits and site usage (anonymized when possible).
s6.li3: Marketing: only with your consent (e.g., social pixels).

s7.title: 7. Retention & Security
s7.body: Data is retained only as long as needed for the above purposes and as required by law. We apply technical and organizational measures to protect confidentiality, integrity, and availability.

s8.title: 8. Your rights
s8.li1: Access, rectification, erasure (‚Äúright to be forgotten‚Äù).
s8.li4: Withdrawal of consent for marketing/non-essential cookies.
s8.li5: Complaint to the competent data protection authority.

s9.title: 9. Minors
s9.body: Our services are intended for adults. Bookings by minors require the presence and approval of a parent/legal guardian.

s10.title: 10. Contact & DPO
s10.body: For any personal data request, contact us: holidayvillas.ks (Instagram) or the contact email on the site. We will respond as soon as possible.

s2.title: 2. Bookings & Payments
s2.li1: A booking is confirmed after completing payment or the deposit.
s2.li2: Prices: Premium ‚Ç¨200/night, VIP ‚Ç¨250/night (base up to 2 persons). Over 2 persons, +‚Ç¨50/person/night (maximum 6 persons).

s3.title: 3. Cancellations & Changes
